archimate:Requirement.name: All development plans of new service/offering, internal development, and architecturally significant changes to service/offering/platform shall be reviewed according to defined processes. A High-Level Design needs to be produced and reviewed for new service/offering, and architecturally significant changes. Reviews of these artefacts must be conducted by assigned Enterprise Architect.â€‹
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This requirement is derived directly from the Tech Services Architecture Principles.
